title: How you can help
intro: We save lives every day, but we need help to continue. Fortunately, there are many ways you can support our work – from 1 euro/month donations to virtual adoptions or sharing our posts.
highlight: ❤️ Any help is appreciated and goes directly towards doing good.

items.donationsTitle: Any donation to our ING / PayPal / Revolut accounts
items.monthlyDonationsTitle: Donations to our monthly fundraising campaigns
items.monthlyDonationsText: Join our monthly campaigns – every contribution counts!
items.benevityText: If you work in a company using Benevity, you can donate quickly through this platform.
items.teamingText: An automatic donation of just 1 euro/month.
items.virtualAdoptionText: Become an adoptive parent for a shelter animal.
items.buyDonateText: Buy handmade decorations – the entire amount goes to CARPE.
items.company20Title: Companies: donate 20% of your profit tax
items.company20Text: If your company pays profit tax, you can direct 20% of it to CARPE.
items.volunteerText: The shelter is located 40 km from Bucharest. We always need help — cleaning, feeding, or care.
items.ambassadorText: Like & Share! Spread our posts to help us reach more people. Visibility saves lives!
